item0.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 0 Attack Speed for 8s (90s ).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item1.name: Infinity Edge
item1.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item4.name: Doran's Blade
item4.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 0 Attack Speed for 8s (90s ).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item3.name: Doran's Blade
item3.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item4.name: Doran's Blade
item4.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Broken Stopwatch
item0.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item4.name: Bloodthirster
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20% Life Steal
  • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.name: Stopwatch
item1.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

20% Critical Strike Chance

item4.name: Death's Dance
item4.description:
50 Attack Damage
40 Armor
15 Ability Haste
  • Ignore Pain: 35% (15% for Ranged users) of physical damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool, grant you 30% Move Speed for 2 seconds and restore 10% of max Health over the duration.

item5.name: Guardian Angel
item5.description:
40 Attack Damage
40 Armor
  • Saving Grace: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

item1.name: Mortal Reminder
item1.description:
25 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Sepsis: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. Dealing 3 consecutive Attacks to an enemy champion enhances this effect to 60% Grievous Wounds against them until the effect is allowed to elapse.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Guardian Angel
item0.description:
40 Attack Damage
40 Armor
  • Saving Grace: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

item1.name: Quicksilver Sash
item1.description:
30 Magic Resist

Active - Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) (90s cooldown).

item2.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 0 Attack Speed for 8s (90s ).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item4.name: Infinity Edge
item4.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item5.name: Bloodthirster
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20% Life Steal
  • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).
